titles: Some queries proposed, to the monethly meeting of the Quakers at Aberdeen; the sixth day of June, 1700. By Robert Sandilands With their answers thereto; together with some remarks thereupon. Published by authority. To which is prefixed a letter from George Keith, sent to the Quakers in Aberdeen, containing a very serious and Christian expostulation with his old friends, &c.
author: Sandilands, Robert.
Keith, George, 1639?-1716. aut
publisher: printed by Iohn Forbes, printer to the City and University,
notes: "George Keith's letter" has caption title on p. 1.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Society of Friends --  Early works to 1800.
